unnormalised: Ayurveda treatments are so fascinating! I've been looking into getting a Shirodhara treatment in Kerala, maybe around 10/10/2024. Heard good things about Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala. Anyone tried it? Is it worth the Rs. 5000 or so? I'm free only after 17:00 hrs. Any experience with panchakarma? My dadi swears by it since 1970! Planning a wellness retreat, about 100 km from Pune. Need recs!
